info.title: grocy REST API
info.description:
Authentication is done via API keys (header *GROCY-API-KEY* or same named query parameter), which you can manage [here](PlaceHolderManageApiKeysUrl).
Additionally requests from within the frontend are also valid (via session cookie).

tags.name: Generic entity interactions
tags.description: A limited set of entities are directly exposed for convenience

tags.name: Stock "by-barcode"
tags.description: Some of the *Stock* routes, but access them by the products barcode instead of its id

get.summary: Returns information about the installed grocy, PHP and SQLite version
Returns the time when the database was last changed
Returns all config settings

400.description: The operation was not successful

post.description: Only when MODE == 'dev', so should only be called then

400.description: The operation was not successful

parameters.description: A valid object id of the given entity

requestBody.description: A valid entity object of the entity specified in parameter *entity*

get.summary: Returns all objects of the given entity where the field "name" contains the search string (so only works for entities which have that field)

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: A valid object id of the given entity

put.summary: Edits the given userfields of the given object of the given entity

parameters.name: objectId

requestBody.description: A valid entity object of the entity specified in parameter *entity*

400.description: The operation was not successful

get.summary: Serves the given file

parameters.name: force_serve_as
parameters.description: Force the file to be served as the given type

parameters.name: best_fit_height
parameters.description: Only when using `force_serve_as` = `picture`: Downscale the picture to the given height while maintaining the aspect ratio

parameters.name: best_fit_width
parameters.description: Only when using `force_serve_as` = `picture`: Downscale the picture to the given width while maintaining the aspect ratio

200.description: The binary file contents (Content-Type header is automatically set based on the file type)

400.description: The operation was not successful

put.description: The file will be stored at /data/storage/{group}/{file_name} (you need to remember the group and file name to get or delete it again)

400.description: The operation was not successful
The operation was not successful

post.summary: Creates a new user

400.description: The operation was not successful
The operation was not successful

get.summary: Returns all settings of the currently logged in user

400.description: The operation was not successful

get.summary: Returns the given setting of the currently logged in user

parameters.name: settingKey
parameters.description: The key of the user setting

400.description: The operation was not successful

put.summary: Sets the given setting of the currently logged in user

parameters.name: settingKey
parameters.description: The key of the user setting

400.description: The operation was not successful

get.summary: Returns all products which are currently in stock incl. the next expiring date per product
Returns details of the given stock

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product)

amount.description: The amount to add - please note that when tare weight handling for the product is enabled, this needs to be the amount including the container weight (gross), the amount to be posted will be automatically calculated based on what is in stock and the defined tare weight

best_before_date.description: The best before date of the product to add, when omitted, the current date is used

price.description: The price per purchase quantity unit in configured currency

open.description: If the stock entry was already opened or not

location_id.description: If omitted, the default location of the product is used

shopping_location_id.description: If omitted, no store will be affected

purchased_date.description: The date when this stock entry was purchased

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product, invalid transaction type)

get.summary: Returns all products which are expiring soon, are already expired or currently missing

parameters.name: expiring_days
parameters.description: The number of days in which products are considered expiring soon

get.summary: Returns details of the given product

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product)

get.summary: Returns all locations where the given product currently has stock

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product)

get.summary: Returns all stock entries of the given product in order of next use (first expiring first, then first in first out)

parameters.name: include_sub_products
parameters.description: If sub products should be included (if the given product is a parent product and in addition to the ones of the given product)

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product)

get.summary: Returns the price history of the given product

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product)

post.summary: Adds the given amount of the given product to stock

amount.description: The amount to add - please note that when tare weight handling for the product is enabled, this needs to be the amount including the container weight (gross), the amount to be posted will be automatically calculated based on what is in stock and the defined tare weight

best_before_date.description: The best before date of the product to add, when omitted, the current date is used

price.description: The price per purchase quantity unit in configured currency

location_id.description: If omitted, the default location of the product is used

shopping_location_id.description: If omitted, no store will be affected

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product, invalid transaction type)

post.summary: Removes the given amount of the given product from stock

amount.description: The amount to remove - please note that when tare weight handling for the product is enabled, this needs to be the amount including the container weight (gross), the amount to be posted will be automatically calculated based on what is in stock and the defined tare weight

spoiled.description: True when the given product was spoiled, defaults to false

stock_entry_id.description: A specific stock entry id to consume, if used, the amount has to be 1

recipe_id.description: A valid recipe id for which this product was used (for statistical purposes only)

location_id.description: A valid location id (if supplied, only stock at the given location is considered, if ommitted, stock of any location is considered)

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product, invalid transaction type, given amount > current stock amount)

post.summary: Transfers the given amount of the given product from one location to another (this is currently not supported for tare weight handling enabled products)

amount.description: The amount to transfer - please note that when tare weight handling for the product is enabled, this needs to be the amount including the container weight (gross), the amount to be posted will be automatically calculated based on what is in stock and the defined tare weight

location_id_from.description: A valid location id, the location from where the product should be transfered

location_id_to.description: A valid location id, the location to where the product should be transfered

stock_entry_id.description: A specific stock entry id to transfer, if used, the amount has to be 1

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product, no existing from or to location, given amount > current stock amount at the source location)

post.summary: Inventories the given product (adds/removes based on the given new amount)

new_amount.description: The new current amount for the given product - please note that when tare weight handling for the product is enabled, this needs to be the amount including the container weight (gross), the amount to be posted will be automatically calculated based on what is in stock and the defined tare weight

best_before_date.description: The best before date which applies to added products

shopping_location_id.description: If omitted, no store will be affected

location_id.description: If omitted, the default location of the product is used (only applies to added products)

price.description: If omitted, the last price of the product is used (only applies to added products)

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product)

post.summary: Marks the given amount of the given product as opened

amount.description: The amount to mark as opened

stock_entry_id.description: A specific stock entry id to open, if used, the amount has to be 1

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product, given amount > current unopened stock amount)

get.summary: Returns details of the given product by its barcode

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Unknown barcode)

post.summary: Adds the given amount of the by its barcode given product to stock

amount.description: The amount to add - please note that when tare weight handling for the product is enabled, this needs to be the amount including the container weight (gross), the amount to be posted will be automatically calculated based on what is in stock and the defined tare weight

best_before_date.description: The best before date of the product to add, when omitted, the current date is used

price.description: The price per purchase quantity unit in configured currency

location_id.description: If omitted, the default location of the product is used

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product, invalid transaction type)

amount.description: The amount to remove - please note that when tare weight handling for the product is enabled, this needs to be the amount including the container weight (gross), the amount to be posted will be automatically calculated based on what is in stock and the defined tare weight

stock_entry_id.description: A specific stock entry id to consume, if used, the amount has to be 1

recipe_id.description: A valid recipe id for which this product was used (for statistical purposes only)

location_id.description: A valid location id (if supplied, only stock at the given location is considered, if ommitted, stock of any location is considered)

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product, invalid transaction type, given amount > current stock amount)

post.summary: Transfers the given amount of the by its barcode given product from one location to another (this is currently not supported for tare weight handling enabled products)

amount.description: The amount to transfer - please note that when tare weight handling for the product is enabled, this needs to be the amount including the container weight (gross), the amount to be posted will be automatically calculated based on what is in stock and the defined tare weight

location_id_from.description: A valid location id, the location from where the product should be transfered

location_id_to.description: A valid location id, the location to where the product should be transfered

stock_entry_id.description: A specific stock entry id to transfer, if used, the amount has to be 1

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product, no existing from or to location, given amount > current stock amount at the source location)

post.summary: Inventories the by its barcode given product (adds/removes based on the given new amount)

new_amount.description: The new current amount for the given product - please note that when tare weight handling for the product is enabled, this needs to be the amount including the container weight (gross), the amount to be posted will be automatically calculated based on what is in stock and the defined tare weight

best_before_date.description: The best before date which applies to added products

location_id.description: If omitted, the default location of the product is used (only applies to added products)

price.description: If omitted, the last price of the product is used (only applies to added products)

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product)

post.summary: Marks the given amount of the by its barcode given product as opened

amount.description: The amount to mark as opened

stock_entry_id.description: A specific stock entry id to open, if used, the amount has to be 1

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing product, given amount > current unopened stock amount)

post.summary: Adds currently missing products (below defined min. stock amount) to the given shopping list

list_id.description: The shopping list to use, when omitted, the default shopping list (with id 1) is used

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing shopping list)

post.summary: Removes all items from the given shopping list

list_id.description: The shopping list id to clear, when omitted, the default shopping list (with id 1) is used

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing shopping list)

post.summary: Adds the given amount of the given product to the given shopping list
post.description: If the product is already on the shopping list, the given amount will increase the amount of the already existing item, otherwise a new item will be added

product_id.description: A valid product id of the item on the shopping list

list_id.description: A valid shopping list id, when omitted, the default shopping list (with id 1) is used

product_amount.description: The amount of product units to add, when omitted, the default amount of 1 is used

note.description: The note of the shopping list item

example.note: This is the note of the shopping list item...

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing shopping list, Invalid product id supplied)

post.summary: Removes the given amount of the given product from the given shopping list, if it is on it
post.description: If the resulting amount is <= 0, the item will be completely removed from the given list, otherwise the given amount will reduce the amount of the existing item

product_id.description: A valid product id of the item on the shopping list

list_id.description: A valid shopping list id, when omitted, the default shopping list (with id 1) is used

product_amount.description: The amount of product units to remove, when omitted, the default amount of 1 is used

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing shopping list, Invalid product id supplied)

get.summary: Returns the given stock booking

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Invalid stock booking id)

post.summary: Undoes a booking

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing booking)

get.summary: Returns all stock bookings of the given transaction id

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing transaction)

post.summary: Undoes a transaction

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing transaction)

get.summary: Executes an external barcode lookoup via the configured plugin with the given barcode

parameters.name: add
parameters.description: When true, the product is added to the database on a successful lookup and the new product id is in included in the response

200.description: An ExternalBarcodeLookupResponse object or null, when nothing was found for the given barcode

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Plugin error)

post.summary: Adds all missing products for the given recipe to the shopping list

excludedProductIds.description: An optional array of product ids to exclude them from being put on the shopping list

get.summary: Get stock fulfillment information for the given recipe

400.description: The operation was not successful

post.summary: Consumes all products of the given recipe

get.summary: Get stock fulfillment information for all recipe

400.description: The operation was not successful

get.summary: Returns all chores incl. the next estimated execution time per chore
Returns details of the given chore

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing chore)

post.summary: Tracks an execution of the given chore

tracked_time.description: The time of when the chore was executed, when omitted, the current time is used

done_by.description: A valid user id of who executed this chore, when omitted, the currently authenticated user will be used

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing chore)

post.summary: Undoes a chore execution

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing booking)

post.summary: (Re)calculates all next user assignments of all chores

chore_id.description: The chore id of the chore which next user assignment should be (re)calculated, when omitted, the next user assignments of all chores will (re)caluclated

400.description: The operation was not successful

get.summary: Returns all batteries incl. the next estimated charge time per battery
Returns details of the given battery

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing battery)

post.summary: Tracks a charge cycle of the given battery

tracked_time.description: The time of when the battery was charged, when omitted, the current time is used

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing battery)

post.summary: Undoes a battery charge cycle

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing booking)

get.summary: Returns all tasks which are not done yet

post.summary: Marks the given task as completed

done_time.description: The time of when the task was completed, when omitted, the current time is used

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing task)

post.summary: Marks the given task as not completed

400.description: The operation was not successful (possible errors are: Not existing task)

get.summary: Returns the calendar in iCal format

400.description: The operation was not successful

get.summary: Returns a (public) sharing link for the calendar in iCal format

200.description: The (public) sharing link for the calendar in iCal format

barcode.description: Can contain multiple barcodes separated by comma

stock_id.description: A unique id which references this stock entry during its lifetime

barcode.description: Can contain multiple barcodes separated by comma

id.description: The id of the added product, only included when the producted was added to the database

last_tracked.description: When this chore was last tracked

track_count.description: How often this chore was tracked so far

last_charged.description: When this battery was last charged

charge_cycles_count.description: How often this battery was charged so far

UserDto.description: A user object without the *password* and with an additional *display_name* property

best_before_date.description: The next best before date for this product

is_aggregated_amount.description: Indicates wheter this product has sub-products or not / if the fields `amount_aggregated` and `amount_opened_aggregated` are filled

next_estimated_execution_time.description: The next estimated execution time of this chore, 2999-12-31 23:59:59 when the given chore has a period_type of manually

next_estimated_charge_time.description: The next estimated charge time of this battery, 2999-12-31 23:59:59 when the given battery has no charge_interval_days defined
